required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Reconstructions With Back Donor Site Flaps and Validation of Quality of Life Scales
clinical_study.official_title: Reconstructions With Back Donor Site Flaps and Validation of Quality of Life Scales

brief_summary.textblock:
The latissimus dorsi flap is the oldest and most used technique for breast reconstruction. Nonetheless, there are few studies evaluation the long-term effect of harvesting one of the muscles of the back. This project has four parts.
1. Validation of scales/instrument for Swedish.
2. Long-term results after reconstruction with latissimus dorsi- a ten year retrospective follow-up.
3. Thoracodorsal artery perforator flap (TDAP) vs latissimus dorsi flap- a randomized controlled trial - breast reconstruction.
4. TDAP vs Limber flap - a randomized controlled trial- reconstruction of axillary hidradenitis suppurativa.

primary_outcome.measure: Satisfaction after breast reconstruction with latissimus dorsi reconstruction
primary_outcome.description: Breast Q reconstruction.The BREAST-Q has multiple domains, each scored from 0 to 100 (higher scores indicate greater satisfaction or quality of life), there is no overall BREAST-Q score.

primary_outcome.measure: Back and shoulder function after breast reconstruction with latissimus dorsi reconstruction
primary_outcome.description: Breast Q the back and shoulder function scale. The scale is scored from 0 (worst) to 100 (best). Higher scores reflect a better outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Back appearance after breast reconstruction with latissimus dorsi reconstruction
primary_outcome.description: Breast-Q the back appearance scale.The scale is scored from 0 (worst) to 100 (best). Higher scores reflect a better outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Satisfaction after breast reconstruction with TDAP
primary_outcome.description: Breast Q reconstruction.The BREAST-Q has multiple domains, each scored from 0 to 100 (higher scores indicate greater satisfaction or quality of life), there is no overall BREAST-Q score.

primary_outcome.measure: Back appearance after breast reconstruction with TDAP
primary_outcome.description: Breast Q back appearance scale.The scale is scored from 0 (worst) to 100 (best). Higher scores reflect a better outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Back and shoulder function after breast reconstruction with TDAP
primary_outcome.description: Breast Q back and shoulder function. The scale is scored from 0 (worst) to 100 (best). Higher scores reflect a better outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Generic health-status after breast reconstruction with TDAP
primary_outcome.description: EuroQol-5 (EQ5D) has two components health state description and evaluation.health status is measured in terms of five dimensions (5D); mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. It has five levels of severity: having no problems, having slight problems, having moderate problems, having severe problems and being unable to do/having extreme problems. It can define 3,125 (=55) different health states. In the evaluation part, the respondents evaluate their overall health status using the visual analogue scale (0-100). A higher scores indicate a better health-status

primary_outcome.measure: Generic health-status after breast reconstruction with latissimus dorsi
primary_outcome.description: EuroQol-5 (EQ5D) has two components health state description and evaluation.health status is measured in terms of five dimensions (5D); mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. It has five levels of severity: having no problems, having slight problems, having moderate problems, having severe problems and being unable to do/having extreme problems. It can define 3,125 (=55) different health states. In the evaluation part, the respondents evaluate their overall health status using the visual analogue scale (0-100). A higher scores indicate a better health-status

primary_outcome.measure: Shoulder function after reconstruction of axillary hidradenitis suppurativa with a limberg flap
primary_outcome.description: Western Ontario Osteoarthritis of the shoulder index (WOOS) provides scores on four domains: (1) physical symptoms; (2) sport, recreation, and work; (3) lifestyle; and (4) emotions.Each question has a possible score from 0-100 giving a total score up to 1900. The highest or most symptomatic score is 1900 and the best or asymptomatic score is 0.

primary_outcome.measure: Shoulder function after reconstruction of axillary hidradenitis suppurativa with a TDAP
primary_outcome.description: Western Ontario Osteoarthritis of the shoulder index (WOOS) provides scores on four domains: (1) physical symptoms; (2) sport, recreation, and work; (3) lifestyle; and (4) emotions.Each question has a possible score from 0-100 giving a total score up to 1900. The highest or most symptomatic score is 1900 and the best or asymptomatic score is 0.

primary_outcome.measure: General health status after reconstruction of axillary hidradenitis suppurativa with a limberg flap.
primary_outcome.description: EuroQol-5 (EQ5D) has two components health state description and evaluation.health status is measured in terms of five dimensions (5D); mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. It has five levels of severity: having no problems, having slight problems, having moderate problems, having severe problems and being unable to do/having extreme problems. It can define 3,125 (=55) different health states. In the evaluation part, the respondents evaluate their overall health status using the visual analogue scale (0-100). A higher scores indicate a better health-status

primary_outcome.measure: General health status after reconstruction of axillary hidradenitis suppurativa with a TDAP
primary_outcome.description: EuroQol-5 (EQ5D) has two components health state description and evaluation.health status is measured in terms of five dimensions (5D); mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. It has five levels of severity: having no problems, having slight problems, having moderate problems, having severe problems and being unable to do/having extreme problems. It can define 3,125 (=55) different health states. In the evaluation part, the respondents evaluate their overall health status using the visual analogue scale (0-100). A higher scores indicate a better health-status

secondary_outcome.description: Measured in patients randomized to TDAP or latissimus dorsi flap.

secondary_outcome.measure: Complications after reconstruction of hidradenitis suppurativa
secondary_outcome.description: Measured in patients randomized to TDAP or a limberg flap.

other_outcome.measure: Validation of Breast Q: The Back Appearance scale for Swedish
other_outcome.description: Translation and validation of the instrument for Swedish

other_outcome.measure: Validation of Breast-Q: The back and shoulder function scale for Swedish
other_outcome.description: Translation and validation of the instrument for Swedish
Measurement of quality of life according to breast-Q in a normative population

other_outcome.measure: Normal material for Breast-Q back appearance scale
other_outcome.description: Measurement of quality of life according to breast-Q back appaearance scale in a normative population

arm_group.description: Axillary hidradenitis suppurativa reconstructed with TDAP
Axillary hidradenitis suppurativa reconstructed with a Limberg flap
Breast reconstruction performed with latissimus dorsi

intervention.intervention_name: Thoracodorsal artery perforator flap (TDAP) to axilla
Thoracodorsal artery perforator flap (TDAP) to breast

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
-Patients eligible for breast reconstruction (radiated patients) or reconstruction for axillary hidradenitis suppurativa
Exclusion Criteria:
- Inability to leave informed consent
- Inability to understand Swedish
- Previous surgery, scaring, on back
